EmailTemplate.name: 4_6_2015 Openstack Survey Reminder.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: 3-minute Open Cloud Survey Closes Tonight! – Win A Home Lab
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Don't miss your chance to be a part of the OpenStack Discussion!
OpenStack deployments among big names like Walmart, Best Buy, Comcast, and PayPal suggest a shift in the industry - open cloud is here to stay. But what are you seeing? You know how you and your organization are approaching (or not approaching) open cloud. Are you also wondering how other organizations like you are tackling it? We are.
Please take this ~3 minute survey to share your experience. This survey closes tonight at 11:00pm EST! <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/VMTurbo-open-cloud-survey> Survey closes Monday, April 6, 2015 11:00pm EST
The findings will be compiled into a report that we will send directly to all participants.
Share your experience. Get industry insight. Win (ridiculously awesome) stuff.
- The VMTurbo Team
Industry Insight Not Enough?
No problem, how about a home lab? Complete the survey for a chance to win a VMTurboStack Home Lab.
VMTurboStack Homelab
Valued over USD $1600.
What’s in the VMTurboStack Home Lab?
- Intel NUC with Intel Core i5-4250U - G.SKILL Ripjaws Series 16GB (2x8G) 204-Pin DDR3 Memory - SAMSUNG 840 EVO 250GB SATA III TLC Internal Solid State Drive - Synology DS415+ Diskless System DiskStation 4-Bay NAS - 2x Dell 1TB 7200 RPM SATA 3.0Gb/s 3.5" Hard Drive - Cisco SG300-10 10-port Gigabit Managed Switch - Rosewill 7ft. Cat 6 Network Cable - VMTurbo Operations Manager 5.1 - OpenStack
See Terms & Conditions <http://vmturbo.com/openstack-survey-2015-vmturbostack-home-lab-giveaway-terms-and-conditions?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=openstacksurvey&utm_content=invite> for details.
